name: The Grinch Returns
description:
You are Santa and your mission is to make the New Year happen by throwing presents down the chimneys and decorating the holiday trees, but the evil Grinch returns and wants to steal the New Year. There is very little time left until 12 o'clock and you must get ahead of the Grinch!

Controls:

wasd - move

space - drop gift 

Made especially for Weekly Game Jam 181

Happy new year!
